title: my skins of teemo
body:
Hi, I don't speak English very well, I have been in the league since 2010, I find the terrible surprise that my teemo skins have taken from me
I buy them and now I don't have them suddenly I demand that they be returned to me I am not willing to pay again I hope answers soon it is very unpleasant to realize this type of action on your part

replies.body:
Send a support ticket. It is probably a bug.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
